original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2301)@</color> 在武將四周，召喚3隻<color=#4cc769>巨木樹妖</color>協助作戰。 <color=#4cc769>巨木樹妖</color>屬性： <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1296)@</color> 武力值：<color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1296)@</color>
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2301)@</color> Around the generals, summon 3 <color=#4cc769>Giant Tree Tree Demons</color>Assist in combat. <color=#4cc769>Big Tree Dryad</color> Attribute:  <color=#FFE787>Stamina value: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1296)@</color>War:  <color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1296)@</color>
